attributes.action: Put a stop to violent fathers trying to get access to children.
attributes.additional_details: Why should any parent who has suffered domestic violence and a child conceived through rape have to go through the strain and distress of going through court procedures for the justice system to allow a man to see the child that came from a crime he committed. Let’s put a stop to this and tighten the rules on child contact between children and violent parents!
attributes.background: To stop the justice system from allowing access to children concieved through sexual assault amd domestic violence allowing mothers to be able to raise their children without having to go through relieving the nightmare of court procedures and lengthy trials.
